text:
[Verse]
Lonely city night
Neon signs so bright
Walking down the street
Heart skips a beat

[Verse 2]
Crowded avenue
People rush right through
But I stand alone
Lost in my own zone

[Chorus]
City lights city sights
Dancing in the night
Feeling free just you and me
Underneath the bright marquee

[Verse 3]
Taxi horns they blare
Music fills the air
Sidewalks come alive
Electric vibes they jive

[Chorus]
City lights city sights
Dancing in the night
Feeling free just you and me
Underneath the bright marquee

[Bridge]
Stars above they fade
All the city's made
Memories in the haze
Urban life's sweet maze
title: Lost in the City Lights
